value.title: SoFi stock falls after fintech firm accidentally releases first-quarter report early
value.excerpt: Shares of SoFi fell sharply on Tuesday and were halted for nearly three hours after the company accidentally released its first-quarter results early. The company said the report was released early due to human error.
